patthana23.22:4.1: Naanupādinnupādāniyaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā anupādinnupādāniyo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.22:5.1: Naanupādinnupādāniyaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā anupādinnupādāniyo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.22:6.1: Naupādinnupādāniyaṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anupādinnupādāniyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.22:6.3: Hetuyā pañca, adhipatiyā pañca … pe … avigate pañca.
